'''Floral Coupon''' is an event currency for the [[Windblume's Breath]] event. They can be earned as a reward from the [[Windblume's Breath/Floral Pursuit|Floral Pursuit challenges]] and can be spent in the [[Windblume's Breath#Floral Coupon|Event Shop]] for valuable rewards.
